item.title: [BHS1][Public Cloud] - Instances incident notification
item.description:
Mar 2, 21:24 UTC
Update - We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our Compute - Instance offer in BHS1.

Here are some supplementary details :
Start time : 02/03/2025 19:55 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some instances located inBHS1 are temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to access and use their instances in BHS1.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by an electrical equipment issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident is still ongoing. We would like to assure you that we are doing our utmost to resolve this situation as quickly as possible.

As soon as the situation evolves or the incident is resolved, we will keep you informed.

Thank you for your understanding

Mar 2, 20:18 UTC
Identified - We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our Compute - Instance offer in BHS1.

Here are some supplementary details :
Start time : 02/03/2025 19:55 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some instances located inBHS1 are temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to access and use their instances in BHS1.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by an electrical equipment issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

Our teams are fully engaged and working to resolve the issue as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Please find below an update on the situation:

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Feb 25, 11:34 UTC

Start time : 25/02/2025 09:33 UTC

Customers Impact : Some instance are unavailable for customers.
Root Cause : This incident is due to a problem with the cooling system.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

Our teams are fully engaged and working to resolve the issue as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
